maqras.text: Praise/glorify your Lord`s name the highest/mightiest
Who created, so He straightened
And who predestined/evaluated , so He guided
And who brought out/made (to) emerge the pasture
So He made/created it rotten/spoiled (thin and dry) green/red with blackness
We will make you read, so do not forget
Except what God willed/wanted/intended, that He truly knows the declared/publicized and what hides
And We ease you to the ease/prosperity
So remind if the remembrance/reminder benefited
Who fears will remember/praise/glorify
And the most miserable/unhappy avoids/distances himself from it
Who roasts/suffers the fire , the greatest
Then he does not die in it and nor live
Who purified/corrected had succeeded/won
And mentioned/remembered his Lord`s name, so he prayed
But you prefer/choose the life the present/worldly life
And the end (other life is) better and more lasting (everlasting)
That truly that (is) in (E) the written pages (Books/Scriptures) the first/beginning
Abraham`s and Moses` written pages (Books/Scriptures)
Did the disaster`s/pericardium`s/Resurrection`s information/news come to you
Faces/fronts (on) that day (are) humble/submissive
Making/doing/working, fatigued/exhausted
It roasts/suffers a hot fire
Being given drink/being watered from (a) present/near water well/spring
Food/feeding is not for them except from Dareigh/gland (excretion)
(It) does not fatten (nourish), and nor enriches/suffices from starvation/hunger
Faces/fronts (on) that day (are) comfortable and eased/happy/smooth
Accepting/approving for its striving/endeavor
In an elevated/dignified treed garden/paradise
You do not hear/listen (to) nonsense/senseless talk in it
In it (is a) flowing/running water well/spring
In it (are) raised royal beds/sofas
And laid/raised cups
And lined/arranged small pillows/cushions
And scattered/distributed carpets/rugs
Do they not look/wonder about to the camels how it was created
And to the sky/space how it was raised
And to the mountains how it was erected and raised/affixed
And to the earth/Planet Earth how it was outspread/surfaced
So remind, truly you are a reminder
You are not on them with dominating/controlling
Except who turned away and disbelieved
So God tortures him the torture, the greatest
That truly to Us (is) their return
Then that truly on Us (is) their account/calculation
And/by the dawn
And/by ten nights
And/by the double/even number, and the odd/singular/uneven
And/by the night when (it) goes/departs
Is in that an oath to (those) of (E) a mind
Did you not see/understand how your Lord made/did with Aad
Iram that of the pillars/posts
Which was not created similar/equal to it in the countries/cities
And Thamud who pierced/penetrated the rock/rock terrain at the valley
And Pharaoh that of the stakes/pegs/nails
Those who tyrannized/exceeded the limit in the countries/cities
So they increased (made too much) in it the corruption
So your Lord poured on them (the) torture`s intensity/severity
That truly your Lord (is) at the watch/observation/ambuscade (E)
So but the human/mankind when as long as his Lord tested him, so he honoured him and He blessed/comforted and eased him , so he says: "My Lord honored me
And but when as long as He tested him, so He tightened/strained on him His/his provision, so he says: "My Lord humiliated/disgraced/degraded me
No but, you do not honour/be kind/generous (to) the orphan
And nor you urge/insight/influence on feeding the poorest of poor/poor oppressed
And you eat the inheritance accumulatively/collectively gluttony
And you love/like the property/possession/wealth lovingly excessively
No but, when/if the earth/Planet Earth was hammered down/crushed , crushingly/destroyingly ,crushingly/destroyingly
And your Lord came and the angels (in) a row/arranged (after) a row/arranged
And came (on) that day with Hell ; that day the human/mankind remembers/mentions , and from where (is) for him the remembrance/reminder
He says: "Oh if only I advanced/presented/preceded for my life
So (on) that day no one tortures His torture
And no one ties/chains/affirms His tying/chaining (restraining)
You, you the self, the assured/tranquil
Return to your Lord accepting/approving, accepted/approved
So enter in (among) My worshippers/servants
And enter My treed garden/paradise
